Feeling worthless and wanting to disappear

The main event in this passage is the feeling of worthlessness and the desire to disappear. The speaker feels that their life has no meaning and that they are not valued by anyone, including themselves. They also express a sense of hopelessness and helplessness, as they feel that they cannot overcome these feelings and that they are slipping deeper into a state of depression.

Sometimes I wish I could just disappear and be forgotten, it would be less painful than the constant struggle to find meaning in my life." #GAS #GlobalAttributionalStyle #NegativeSelfTalk
